entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
